news_header: Luis Rubiales guilty of sexual assault for kissing Jenni Hermoso without consent; fined €10,800 and banned from contacting her.
news_original_title: Spain's ex-football boss Luis Rubiales fined for World Cup kiss
news_text: Luis Rubiales, former head of Spain's football federation, was found guilty of sexual assault for kissing player Jenni Hermoso without consent. He was fined €10,800 and banned from contacting her for one year. The incident sparked protests and led to a broader movement against sexism in women's football. Rubiales resigned following the ruling.
